ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for him who gives out and has taqwa
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet he who gives to others and has fear,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for him who gave out his wealth (for Allah's sake) and abstained (from disobeying Him),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We shall facilitate the path to bliss
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So for one who gave and practised piety
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: As for him who gives and has Taqwa,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then as for him who gives away and guards (against evil),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: As for him who gives and is godfearing
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: As for him who giveth and is dutiful (toward Allah)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: As for one who gives [to others] and fears [God],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then as for him who giveths and feareth Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: As for him who gives and is Godwary
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So he who gives (in charity) and fears (Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: As for him who gives (in charity) and keeps his duty to Allah and fears Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: For him that gives and fears (Allah)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As for him who gives and is righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: As for he who gives and fears Allah
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:5] As for him who gives, what is due to God, and is fearful, of God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (As for him who giveth) to charity from his wealth for the sake of Allah and bought nine believers who were in the hands of the disbelievers who tortured them to renounce their religion; this person bought them and then freed them (and is dutiful (towards Allah)) and wards off disbelief, idolatry and indecencies
